name: Toilet Pandemia
description:
As a manager collecting your final stocks, you have to be able to collect as many supplies as possible, while avoiding the infected Karens that want to speak to you.

Since they are infected, you need to maintain social distancing. Luckily, you have their weakness: vaccines. Use this, and storm through the wave of angry women for the sake of saving the last ass-wipers of the world.

Members:

Tuan Khoi Nguyen
